answer.summary: Web page nesting is possible using HTML containers, frames, or sections. Hierarchical structures can be created, but limitations such as performance and maintenance exist.

q_1753177855.primaryQuestion: 4. What is the advantage of collapsing white space?

answer.summary: In HTML, a blank sequence of whitespace characters is treated as a single space character, Because t...
answer.detailed: In HTML, a blank sequence of whitespace characters is treated as a single space character, Because the browser collapses multiple spaces into a single space character and this helps a developer to indent lines of text without worrying about multiple spaces and maintain readability and understandability of HTML codes.
